name: Beat Cop
description: A retro, pixel art style adventure in New York, inspired by ’80s cop shows. You are Jack Kelly and you’ve been framed for murder. Now as a regular beat cop you have to find out, who did that. Expect thick crime story, a lot of black humour and all the other things you can find on the streets of Brooklyn.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 (32 bit) / Vista Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo 2.4, AMD Athlon(TM) X2 2.8 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics card. GeForce 9600 GS Shader Model 3.0 512 MB or better. DirectX: Version 9.0c Sound Card: DirectX compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Quad 2.7 Ghz, AMD Phenom(TM)II X4 3 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics card. GeForce GTX 260 1024 MB or better. DirectX: Version 9.0c Sound Card: DirectX compatible
